activities.loc: Richland County Courtroom, Floor C, Courthouse

result.execSummary:
This case has not been concluded. Unless a judgment of conviction is entered, the defendant is presumed innocent of all charges.

Notice to employers: It may be a violation of state law to discriminate against a job applicant because of an arrest or conviction record. Generally speaking, an employer may refuse to hire an applicant on the basis of a conviction only if the circumstances of the conviction substantially relate to the particular job. For more information, see Wisconsin Statute 111.335 and the Department of Workforce Development's publication, Arrest and Conviction Records under the Law.

Harper in court for State of Wisconsin. Attorney Bartelt state that they have received an offer from the State and asks for more time to consider that offer.
Status conference scheduled for November 21, 2022 at 11:00 am.

2:33 PM 2022CF000015, 2022CF000089, 2021CF000152 - Defendant Stuart L. Boe in court.  Attorney Peter A. Bartelt in court for Stuart L. Boe.  Attorney Jennifer M. Harper in court for State of Wisconsin. 

Attorney Bartelt waives the preliminary hearing in 22CF89. Court goes over the waiver of the preliminary hearing form. Court binds this case over for trial. Attorney Harper bring forth the same charges. Attorney Bartelt waives the formal reading and stand mute on behalf of  his client. Max penalties stated.
Status conference scheduled for October 12, 2022 at 03:00 pm.

records.addlTxt: 3:26 PM Defendant Stuart L. Boe in court, in custody.  Attorney Peter A. Bartelt in court for Stuart L. Boe.  Attorney Jennifer M. Harper by zoom for State of Wisconsin. Attorney Bartelt speaks about bond and asks for $500 cash bond. Attorney Harper objects to any bond modification and doesn't request any bond increase. Court reduces bail to $1,000 cash bond.
Status hearing on August 1, 2022 at 03:30 pm.
Preliminary hearing on September 14, 2022 at 03:00 pm.

9:11 AM 2022CF000015, 2022CF000089, 2021CF000152 - Defendant Stuart L. Boe in court, in custody.  Attorney Peter A. Bartelt in court for Stuart L. Boe.  Attorney Jennifer M. Harper in court for State of Wisconsin. 

22CF89 - Attorney Bartelt has received the complaint and waives the formal reading. Max penalties stated. Attorney Bartelt waives the time limit of the preliminary hearing.
Attorney Bartelt speaks about the $5,000 cash bond and request a signature bond. Attorney Harper objects to the modification of bond. Court asks if Attorney Bartelt knows how long DOC needs; Attorney Bartelt doesn't know. Court denies the motion at this time and  set bail review in this case for 08/01/22 at 3:30. The court is interest on what probation thinks.

1:12 PM Defendant Stuart Boe appeared by video, in custody. Attorney Harper appears in person. SB hasn't called the public defenders office. 
State asks for a $5,000 cash bond. No contact with Parkview Motel
SB heard and can't post any amount of money.
Court orders $5,000 cash bond. No contact with Parkview Motel
Initial set for 07/22/22 at 9 AM
